scripts.build: bun build src/index.tsx --outdir dist --target node --packages bundle --external react-devtools-core --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' && sed -i '' 's|#!/usr/bin/env bun|#!/usr/bin/env node|' dist/index.js && sed -i '' 's|import devtools from "react-devtools-core";|var devtools = { connect: () => ({ isConnected: false }) };|g' dist/index.js
